entry.title: New release for Grimoire: v0.2.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Refactor/use proxy for pocketbase by @goniszewski in https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire/pull/48
  • chore(deps-dev): bump vite from 4.5.0 to 4.5.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire/pull/42

New Contributors

  • @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire/pull/42

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire/compare/v0.2.1...v0.2.2

entry.title: New release for Grimoire: v0.2.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Revert "Refactor/use proxy for pocketbase" by @goniszewski in https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire/pull/51

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire/compare/v0.2.2...v0.2.3

entry.title: New release for Grimoire: v0.2.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore(deps-dev): bump vite from 4.5.1 to 4.5.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire/pull/57
  • Chore/reduce tech debt by @goniszewski in https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire/pull/58
  • 40 grimoire web app is showing outdated information for settings and bookmarks by @goniszewski in https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire/pull/55

Dev note

  • We're now using the latest Vite 5 and SvelteKit 2.5! ðŸ†•
  • Actions on Bookmarks and updating UI settings should now immediately affect the local state âš¡

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire/compare/v0.2.3...v0.2.4

entry.title: New release for Grimoire: v0.2.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: use token-based authentication for API requests by @goniszewski in https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire/pull/61
  • Feat/update API for bookmark extension by @goniszewski in https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire/pull/62

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire/compare/v0.2.4...v0.2.5

entry.title: New release for Grimoire: v0.2.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore(deps): bump sanitize-html from 2.11.0 to 2.12.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire/pull/64
  • chore(deps): bump ip from 2.0.0 to 2.0.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire/pull/65
  • feat: support display screenshots by @goniszewski in https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire/pull/63
  • feat: check PocketBase connection and inform user if it fails by @goniszewski in https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire/pull/69

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire/compare/v0.2.5...v0.2.6
